mapper.select: SELECT RQ.RQ_CODE AS rqCode, RQ.RQ_FILTERCODE AS rqFilterCode, RQ.RQ_PERIOD AS rqPeriod, RQ.RQ_TITLE AS rqTitle, SG.SG_SUBNAME AS rqSubName, MG.MG_IMG AS rqImage, ST.ST_CODE AS rqStatus FROM RQ INNER JOIN MG ON RQ.RQ_FILTERCODE = MG.MG_FILTERCODE INNER JOIN SG ON RQ.RQ_SUBCODE = SG.SG_SUBCODE INNER JOIN ST ON RQ.RQ_STCODE = ST.ST_CODE WHERE RQ.RQ_FILTERCODE= ${rqFilterCode} AND RQ.RQ_STCODE = 'B' ORDER BY RQ.RQ_SYSDATE DESC

SELECT RQ.RQ_CODE AS rqCode, RQ.RQ_FILTERCODE AS rqFilterCode, RQ.RQ_PERIOD AS rqPeriod, RQ.RQ_TITLE AS rqTitle, SG.SG_SUBNAME AS rqSubName, MG.MG_IMG AS rqImage, COUNT(BI.BI_MMHELPER) AS rqBest, ST.ST_CODE AS rqStatus
FROM RQ INNER JOIN MG ON RQ.RQ_FILTERCODE = MG.MG_FILTERCODE INNER JOIN SG ON RQ.RQ_SUBCODE = SG.SG_SUBCODE INNER JOIN ST ON RQ.RQ_STCODE = ST.ST_CODE LEFT JOIN BI ON RQ.RQ_CODE = BI.BI_RQCODE WHERE RQ.RQ_FILTERCODE= ${rqFilterCode} AND RQ.RQ_STCODE = 'B' GROUP BY RQ.RQ_CODE, RQ.RQ_FILTERCODE, RQ.RQ_PERIOD, RQ.RQ_TITLE, SG.SG_SUBNAME, MG.MG_IMG, ST.ST_CODE ORDER BY COUNT(BI.BI_MMHELPER) DESC

SELECT RQ.RQ_CODE AS rqCode, RQ.RQ_FILTERCODE AS rqFilterCode, RQ.RQ_PERIOD AS rqPeriod, RQ.RQ_TITLE AS rqTitle, SG.SG_SUBNAME AS rqSubName, MG.MG_IMG AS rqImage, ST.ST_CODE AS rqStatus FROM RQ INNER JOIN MG ON RQ.RQ_FILTERCODE = MG.MG_FILTERCODE INNER JOIN SG ON RQ.RQ_SUBCODE = SG.SG_SUBCODE INNER JOIN ST ON RQ.RQ_STCODE = ST.ST_CODE WHERE RQ.RQ_STCODE = 'B' ORDER BY RQ.RQ_SYSDATE DESC

SELECT RQ.RQ_CODE AS rqCode, RQ.RQ_FILTERCODE AS rqFilterCode, RQ.RQ_PERIOD AS rqPeriod, RQ.RQ_TITLE AS rqTitle, SG.SG_SUBNAME AS rqSubName, MG.MG_IMG AS rqImage, COUNT(BI.BI_MMHELPER) AS rqBest, ST.ST_CODE AS rqStatus FROM RQ INNER JOIN MG ON RQ.RQ_FILTERCODE = MG.MG_FILTERCODE INNER JOIN SG ON RQ.RQ_SUBCODE = SG.SG_SUBCODE INNER JOIN ST ON RQ.RQ_STCODE = ST.ST_CODE LEFT JOIN BI ON RQ.RQ_CODE = BI.BI_RQCODE WHERE RQ.RQ_STCODE = 'B' group by RQ.RQ_CODE, RQ.RQ_FILTERCODE, RQ.RQ_PERIOD, RQ.RQ_TITLE, SG.SG_SUBNAME, MG.MG_IMG, ST.ST_CODE ORDER BY COUNT(BI.BI_MMHELPER) DESC

SELECT RQ.RQ_CODE AS rqCode, RQ.RQ_FILTERCODE AS rqFilterCode, RQ.RQ_PERIOD AS rqPeriod, RQ.RQ_TITLE AS rqTitle, SG.SG_SUBNAME AS rqSubName, MG.MG_IMG AS rqImage, ST.ST_CODE AS rqStatus FROM RQ INNER JOIN MG ON RQ.RQ_FILTERCODE = MG.MG_FILTERCODE INNER JOIN SG ON RQ.RQ_SUBCODE = SG.SG_SUBCODE INNER JOIN ST ON RQ.RQ_STCODE = ST.ST_CODE WHERE RQ.RQ_STCODE = 'B' AND RQ.RQ_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{rqWord}||'%' OR SG.SG_SUBNAME LIKE '%'||#{rqWord}||'%' ORDER BY RQ.RQ_SYSDATE DESC

SELECT RQ.RQ_CODE AS rqCode, RQ.RQ_FILTERCODE AS rqFilterCode, RQ.RQ_PERIOD AS rqPeriod, RQ.RQ_TITLE AS rqTitle, SG.SG_SUBNAME AS rqSubName, MG.MG_IMG AS rqImage, COUNT(BI.BI_MMHELPER) AS rqBest, ST.ST_CODE AS rqStatus FROM RQ INNER JOIN MG ON RQ.RQ_FILTERCODE = MG.MG_FILTERCODE INNER JOIN SG ON RQ.RQ_SUBCODE = SG.SG_SUBCODE INNER JOIN ST ON RQ.RQ_STCODE = ST.ST_CODE LEFT JOIN BI ON RQ.RQ_CODE = BI.BI_RQCODE WHERE RQ.RQ_STCODE = 'B' AND RQ.RQ_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{rqWord}||'%' OR SG.SG_SUBNAME LIKE '%'||#{rqWord}||'%' GROUP BY RQ.RQ_CODE, RQ.RQ_FILTERCODE, RQ.RQ_PERIOD, RQ.RQ_TITLE, SG.SG_SUBNAME, MG.MG_IMG, ST.ST_CODE ORDER BY COUNT(BI.BI_MMHELPER) DESC

SELECT RQ.RQ_MMID AS rqId, RQ.RQ_CODE AS rqCode, RQ.RQ_PERIOD AS rqPeriod, RQ.RQ_TITLE AS rqTitle, SG.SG_SUBNAME AS rqSubName, TO_CHAR(RQ.RQ_SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS rqDate, MG.MG_IMG AS rqImage,
ST.ST_CODE AS rqStatus FROM RQ INNER JOIN MG ON RQ.RQ_FILTERCODE = MG.MG_FILTERCODE INNER JOIN SG ON RQ.RQ_SUBCODE = SG.SG_SUBCODE INNER JOIN ST ON RQ.RQ_STCODE = ST.ST_CODE WHERE RQ.RQ_MMID = #{rqId} AND RQ.RQ_STCODE = 'B' ORDER BY RQ.RQ_SYSDATE DESC

SELECT BI.BI_MMHELPER AS biHelper, RQ.RQ_CODE AS rqCode, RQ.RQ_PERIOD AS rqPeriod, RQ.RQ_TITLE AS rqTitle, SG.SG_SUBNAME AS rqSubName, MG.MG_IMG AS rqImage, TO_CHAR(RQ.RQ_SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS rqDate, ST.ST_CODE AS rqStatus FROM RQ INNER JOIN MG ON RQ.RQ_FILTERCODE = MG.MG_FILTERCODE INNER JOIN BI ON RQ.RQ_CODE = BI.BI_RQCODE INNER JOIN SG ON RQ.RQ_SUBCODE = SG.SG_SUBCODE INNER JOIN ST ON RQ.RQ_STCODE = ST.ST_CODE WHERE BI.BI_MMHELPER = #{biHelper} AND RQ.RQ_STCODE='B' ORDER BY RQ.RQ_SYSDATE DESC

SELECT RQ.RQ_MMID AS rqId, RQ.RQ_CODE AS rqCode, RQ.RQ_PERIOD AS rqPeriod, RQ.RQ_TITLE AS rqTitle, SG.SG_SUBNAME AS rqSubName, TO_CHAR(RQ.RQ_SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS rqDate, MG.MG_IMG AS rqImage, ST.ST_CODE AS rqStatus FROM RQ INNER JOIN MG ON RQ.RQ_FILTERCODE = MG.MG_FILTERCODE INNER JOIN SG ON RQ.RQ_SUBCODE = SG.SG_SUBCODE INNER JOIN ST ON RQ.RQ_STCODE = ST.ST_CODE WHERE RQ.RQ_MMID = #{rqId} AND RQ.RQ_STCODE = 'I' ORDER BY RQ.RQ_SYSDATE DESC

SELECT WI.WI_HELPER AS winHelper, RQ.RQ_CODE AS rqCode, RQ.RQ_PERIOD AS rqPeriod, RQ.RQ_TITLE AS rqTitle, SG.SG_SUBNAME AS rqSubName, TO_CHAR(RQ.RQ_SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS rqSimpleDate, MG.MG_IMG AS rqImage, ST.ST_CODE AS rqStatus FROM RQ INNER JOIN MG ON RQ.RQ_FILTERCODE = MG.MG_FILTERCODE INNER JOIN WI ON RQ.RQ_CODE = WI.WI_RQCODE INNER JOIN SG ON RQ.RQ_SUBCODE = SG.SG_SUBCODE INNER JOIN ST ON RQ.RQ_STCODE = ST.ST_CODE WHERE WI.WI_HELPER = #{winHelper} AND RQ.RQ_STCODE='I' ORDER BY RQ.RQ_SYSDATE DESC

SELECT RQ.RQ_MMID AS rqId, RQ.RQ_CODE AS rqCode, RQ.RQ_PERIOD AS rqPeriod, RQ.RQ_TITLE AS rqTitle, SG.SG_SUBNAME AS rqSubName, TO_CHAR(RQ.RQ_SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS rqDate, MG.MG_IMG AS rqImage, ST.ST_CODE AS rqStatus FROM RQ INNER JOIN MG ON RQ.RQ_FILTERCODE = MG.MG_FILTERCODE INNER JOIN SG ON RQ.RQ_SUBCODE = SG.SG_SUBCODE INNER JOIN ST ON RQ.RQ_STCODE = ST.ST_CODE WHERE RQ.RQ_MMID = #{rqId} AND RQ.RQ_STCODE = 'E' ORDER BY RQ.RQ_SYSDATE DESC

SELECT WI.WI_HELPER AS winHelper, RQ.RQ_CODE AS rqCode, RQ.RQ_PERIOD AS rqPeriod, RQ.RQ_TITLE AS rqTitle, SG.SG_SUBNAME AS rqSubName, TO_CHAR(RQ.RQ_SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS rqSimpleDate, MG.MG_IMG AS rqImage, ST.ST_CODE AS rqStatus FROM RQ INNER JOIN MG ON RQ.RQ_FILTERCODE = MG.MG_FILTERCODE INNER JOIN WI ON RQ.RQ_CODE = WI.WI_RQCODE INNER JOIN SG ON RQ.RQ_SUBCODE = SG.SG_SUBCODE INNER JOIN ST ON RQ.RQ_STCODE = ST.ST_CODE WHERE WI.WI_HELPER = #{winHelper} AND RQ.RQ_STCODE='E' ORDER BY RQ.RQ_SYSDATE DESC
